concept.title: Required Fields
concept.shortdesc: A required field is a field that must exist in a record to allow it into the stage for processing. When a record does not include a required field, the record is diverted to the pipeline for error handling. You can define required fields for any processor and most destination stages.

conbody.p: pipeline designrequired fieldsrequired fieldsoverviewConfigure required fields as part of the overall pipeline logic or to minimize processing errors. For example, if a Field Hasher encodes social security data in the /SSN field. To ensure all records include social security numbers, you can make /SSN a required field for the stage.
